metadata.description: Real-world test cases extracted from git history for agent backtesting

testCases.description: Phase 1 - zero TypeScript compilation errors (36 → 0)
testCases.errorMessage: TypeScript compilation errors: implicit any types in ProtectedRoute component, missing dependency in useEffect, unsafe component prop spreading
testCases.humanSolution: Added explicit type interfaces (ProtectedRouteProps), fixed dependency arrays, replaced lambda props with render prop pattern

testCases.description: Resolve all TypeScript compilation errors using AI agents
testCases.errorMessage: Multiple TypeScript errors across 22 files: type guards, unused imports, any types, security middleware type mismatches
testCases.humanSolution: AI-assisted fix: removed unused imports, fixed type assertions, corrected middleware signatures, cleaned up any types

testCases.description: Resolve ShareAccessLevel TypeScript type errors
testCases.errorMessage: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'ShareAccessLevel'. ShareAccessLevel is an enum/union type but onValueChange returns string.
testCases.humanSolution: Added ShareAccessLevelType import and used 'as any' type assertion in onValueChange handler as workaround

testCases.description: Resolve critical TypeScript and test failures for CI stability
testCases.errorMessage: Test failures in circuit-breaker tests, TypeScript errors in ChartAdapter, websocket type issues
testCases.humanSolution: Updated vitest config with proper test environment, added type guards, fixed circuit breaker test assertions, created test improvement status doc

testCases.description: Resolve critical test failures and infrastructure gaps
testCases.errorMessage: Missing test infrastructure, circuit breaker implementation incomplete, health guard tests failing
testCases.humanSolution: Created circuit-breaker-cache implementation, added test setup utilities, updated CI workflow, fixed health guard test expectations

testCases.description: Resolve TypeScript errors in fund setup and cash flow generation
testCases.errorMessage: Implicit any type in map callback parameters - exit and index need explicit types
testCases.humanSolution: Added explicit type annotations: (exit: any, index: number) to map callback

testCases.description: Resolve critical TypeScript and ESLint build errors
testCases.errorMessage: ESLint blocking build: config files being linted, unsafe type rules too strict, multiple violations
testCases.humanSolution: Added config files to ignores, disabled strict unsafe-* rules, fixed import errors in server files

testCases.description: Resolve TypeScript errors in React components
testCases.errorMessage: Type mismatches in component props, incorrect generic type parameters, missing type annotations in event handlers
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed generic type parameters, added proper event handler types, corrected component prop interfaces

testCases.description: Resolve schema TypeScript syntax errors by converting multiline omit patterns
testCases.errorMessage: TypeScript syntax errors with multiline omit() patterns in Drizzle schema insert type definitions
testCases.humanSolution: Converted multiline omit() calls to single-line format, simplified schema insert definitions

testCases.description: Resolve unused variable TypeScript errors across codebase
testCases.errorMessage: Widespread @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars violations across 147 files
testCases.humanSolution: Mass automated fix using ZenCoder agent: removed unused imports, commented unused function parameters, removed dead code

testCases.description: Stabilize test suite with systematic fixes and monitoring
testCases.errorMessage: Flaky tests due to timing issues, insufficient test infrastructure, unreliable assertions
testCases.humanSolution: Created test infrastructure utilities, added proper async handling, implemented test risk matrix, added validation scripts

testCases.description: Resolve test infrastructure timing issues and validation script compatibility
testCases.errorMessage: Tests failing due to timer mocking issues, validation script incompatible with vitest async timers
testCases.humanSolution: Changed vi.advanceTimersByTime to vi.advanceTimersByTimeAsync, added Promise.resolve() microtask flushes, updated validation script

testCases.description: Skip failing test suites for green build
testCases.errorMessage: Multiple test suites failing blocking CI pipeline
testCases.humanSolution: Wrapped failing test suites with describe.skip() to unblock CI, documented need for fixes

testCases.description: Resolve merge conflicts and infinite loops in fund setup wizard
testCases.errorMessage: Infinite re-render loop in fund setup wizard causing browser crash, merge conflicts from feature branches
testCases.humanSolution: Massive refactor: resolved merge conflicts, removed duplicate code (1469 lines deleted), fixed state update logic

testCases.description: Resolve infinite loop in fund setup wizard with NaN-safe equality
testCases.errorMessage: NaN values in state causing infinite loops due to NaN !== NaN in equality checks
testCases.humanSolution: Created NaN-safe equality utilities, added state-utils module, implemented proper value comparisons, added test coverage

testCases.description: Improve signature generation with proper sorting and type safety
testCases.errorMessage: Strategy signature generation producing inconsistent results due to object key ordering and missing type safety
testCases.humanSolution: Added deterministic object key sorting, improved type safety with explicit interfaces, enhanced signature generation algorithm

testCases.description: Improve engine calculations and edge cases
testCases.errorMessage: Edge case handling insufficient in reserve and liquidity engines, incorrect calculations for boundary conditions
testCases.humanSolution: Added boundary condition checks, improved edge case handling in multiple engines, enhanced deterministic calculations

testCases.description: Implement critical stability improvements for circuit breaker, TTL cache, and inflight registry
testCases.errorMessage: Circuit breaker state machine unreliable, TTL cache missing features, inflight registry race conditions
testCases.humanSolution: Major refactor of circuit breaker logic, implemented TTL cache properly, fixed race conditions in inflight registry

testCases.description: Preserve query strings and hash fragments in legacy route redirects
testCases.errorMessage: Query parameters and hash fragments being dropped during legacy route redirects
testCases.humanSolution: Updated redirect logic to preserve search params and hash fragments from original URL

testCases.description: Integrate PRNG for deterministic simulations
testCases.errorMessage: Monte Carlo simulations non-deterministic, cannot reproduce results, testing unreliable
testCases.humanSolution: Integrated pseudo-random number generator (PRNG) with seed support, made simulations deterministic and reproducible

testCases.description: Resolve TypeScript compilation errors through AI consensus
testCases.errorMessage: Multiple TypeScript compilation errors requiring cross-file analysis
testCases.humanSolution: Used multi-AI consensus (Gemini, GPT, Claude) to identify and fix complex type issues

testCases.description: Use bracket notation for index signature access in reserve-engine
testCases.errorMessage: TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'string' can't be used to index type
testCases.humanSolution: Changed dot notation to bracket notation for dynamic property access on objects with index signatures

testCases.description: Resolve Recharts Legend content prop TypeScript error
testCases.errorMessage: Type error with Recharts Legend content prop - incorrect type signature for custom legend renderer
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed Legend content prop type to match Recharts v2 API, updated custom legend function signature

testCases.description: Add type assertions to resolve remaining recharts-bundle TypeScript errors
testCases.errorMessage: Multiple TypeScript errors in Recharts component props and event handlers
testCases.humanSolution: Added strategic type assertions, fixed event handler signatures, corrected generic type parameters

testCases.description: Resolve major TypeScript errors (75→28) with infrastructure improvements
testCases.errorMessage: 75 TypeScript compilation errors across codebase requiring systematic approach
testCases.humanSolution: Systematic fix in phases: fixed critical errors first, added type guards, improved infrastructure, reduced to 28 errors

testCases.description: Resolve additional TypeScript errors in predictive-cache and rollout-orchestrator
testCases.errorMessage: Type errors in cache implementation and feature rollout orchestrator
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed generic type constraints, corrected async type signatures, improved type inference

testCases.description: Resolve TypeScript errors (23→19) with targeted fixes
testCases.errorMessage: Remaining TypeScript errors requiring targeted fixes
testCases.humanSolution: Incremental fixes: 4 errors resolved through careful type adjustments and refactoring

testCases.description: Restore omit() calls to schema insert definitions
testCases.errorMessage: Schema insert types missing omit() calls causing type mismatches
testCases.humanSolution: Restored proper omit() calls for auto-generated fields (id, createdAt, updatedAt) in schema insert types

testCases.description: Resolve Investment Strategy column alignment issues
testCases.errorMessage: UI alignment issues in Investment Strategy step table columns
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed CSS grid/flexbox alignment, adjusted column widths and spacing

testCases.description: Phase 0 - security hardening and systematic remediation
testCases.errorMessage: Security vulnerabilities: insufficient input validation, missing sanitization, weak security headers
testCases.humanSolution: Implemented comprehensive security hardening: input sanitization, validation middleware, security headers, rate limiting

testCases.description: Improve test configuration
testCases.errorMessage: Test configuration suboptimal, missing coverage settings, slow test execution
testCases.humanSolution: Optimized test configuration: added coverage settings, improved test isolation, faster execution

testCases.description: Resolve TypeScript compilation issues in variance tracking service
testCases.errorMessage: Type errors in variance tracking service: incorrect generic constraints, missing type guards
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed generic type constraints, added proper type guards, improved type inference in variance calculations

testCases.description: Resolve critical infrastructure issues and framework consolidation
testCases.errorMessage: Infrastructure fragmentation, duplicate implementations, missing abstractions
testCases.humanSolution: Major consolidation: unified infrastructure patterns, removed duplicates, created proper abstractions

testCases.description: Correct insertFundSchema import in routes.ts
testCases.errorMessage: Import error: insertFundSchema not found, incorrect module path
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed import path to correct module location

testCases.description: Correct YAML syntax in synthetic.yml workflow
testCases.errorMessage: YAML syntax error in GitHub Actions workflow preventing CI runs
testCases.humanSolution: Fixed YAML indentation and syntax errors in workflow file
